Ğ’ĞµĞ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°Ñ ĞºĞ»Ğ°ÑÑĞ¸ĞºĞ°...
Ğ•Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ´Ğ²Ğµ Ğ´Ñ‹Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞºĞ¸ Ğ² ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğµ Ñ Ğ²Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ».

Portal is a computer game in the puzzle genre, developed by Valve Corporation in 2007. At the time of the release, it had a revolutionary and interesting gameplay, which has never met anywhere else in the games. The game itself is rather short, it has only 19 levels, which, according to the end of the game, become more complex and hard. The story-line of this game can be described by 2 sentences, but it does not matter here because it is a computer game in the genre of the puzzle as i told before. The game also has some little disadvantages, but they are not so terrible to tell about them very detail (for example, at the beginning of the game, new gameplay caused me little dizziness, but closer to level 6 all became to the norm; second is the old menu stylistics; and the last one is a strange color palette on some moments of the game, red-brown-gray-green, but as said earlier, it is not a big problem). I got great pleasure from the "end level battle" (battle with the boss). I am sure that this moment of the game will be remembered for a long time in my memory. I remind you once again that "Portal 1" is very short and I personally passed it in 5 hours)

My personal mark for this game is 8/10, but considering that in the genre of puzzles for a long time there is nothing really interesting and revolutionary, I'm ready to give this game 9/10, but I advise you to buy this game only during the sale and only with the game Portal 2, since together they are sold at a very good price.

This was quite enjoyable, the puzzles are neat (not too difficult, but will require a little effort on your part). And what's so neat about it is that it stands the test of time, the graphics, mechanics and core concept are still relevant. This makes it easy to recommend so many years after its release (also note that my playtime might not be complete because I often play in offline mode).

It's a very fascinating game. I love the portal mechanics and all the puzzle solving, but i had problems understanding the mechanics in the beginning (probably because i am retarded). I recommend this game to people who like challenges and old classics! This game has also aged very well!
